 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָה‎</span>] **verb** ==encounter, meet, befall== (\|\|) II <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָא‎</span> Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָה‎</span> ***meet*** (rare), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְרִי‎</span> ***misfortune*** specifically (nocturnal) ***pollution***, and so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קִרְיוּתָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) is ***go seek earnestly*** <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***receive hospitably*** as guest; Ethiopic II. 3, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***present, offer as sacrifice***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽרְךָ‎</span> [[Deut.25.18|Deut 25:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(ו)קָרָהוּ‎</span> [[Gen.44.29|Gen 44:29]] +; ***Imperfect***, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְרֶה‎</span> [[Eccl.9.11|Eccl 9:11]] + [[Dan.10.14|Dan 10:14]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְרָא‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָיִ֫קֶר‎</span> [[Ruth.2.3|Ruth 2:3]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְרְךָ‎</span> [[Num.11.23|Num 11:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְּרֵךְ‎</span> [[1Sam.28.10|1Sam 28:10]] (dagesh forte dirimens); ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹרֹת‎</span> [[Gen.42.29|Gen 42:29]] — 

**1.** ***encounter, meet***, accusative of person [[Deut.25.18|Deut 25:18]], compare (accusative of thing) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִ֫קֶר מִקְרֶהָ חֶלְקַת וגו‎</span> [[Ruth.2.3|Ruth 2:3]] ***her chance lighted upon field***, etc. 

**2.** ***befall***, accusative of person, subject evil [[Gen.44.29|Gen 44:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.28.10|1Sam 28:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s word [[Num.11.23|Num 11:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), indefinite [[Gen.42.29|Gen 42:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Isa.41.22|Isa 41:22]] (absolute) [[Esth.4.7|Esth 4:7]]; [[Esth.6.13|Esth 6:13]]; [[Dan.10.14|Dan 10:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵת וָפֶגַע יִק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתכֻּֿלָּם‎</span> [[Eccl.9.11|Eccl 9:11]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקְרֶה‎</span> [[Eccl.2.14|Eccl 2:14]] compare v[[Eccl.2.15|Eccl 2:15]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְרָה‎</span> [[Exod.3.18|Exod 3:18]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְרֵיתִי‎</span> [[2Sam.1.6|2Sam 1:6]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּרֶה‎</span> [[Num.23.3|Num 23:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקָּר‎</span> v[[Num.23.4|Num 23:4]],16; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִקָּרֶה‎</span> v[[Num.23.15|Num 23:15]] — 

**1.** ***encounter, meet*** without pre-arrangement, usually of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (God): with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Exod.3.18|Exod 3:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> Pers. [[Num.23.4|Num 23:4]]; [[Num.23.16|Num 23:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְרָתִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקּ‎</span> v3 (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]); object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (om) v15.


**2.** ***chance to be present***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location, [[2Sam.1.6|2Sam 1:6]] (+Infinitiveabs <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְרֹא‎</span>). 

**Hiph\`il 1.** of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***cause*** ( the right thing good fortune) ***to occur***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְרָה‎</span> [[Gen.27.20|Gen 27:20]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקְרֵה‎</span> [[Gen.24.12|Gen 24:12]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]). 

**2.** of Isrel, ***Perfect*** 2 masculine plural cones <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִקְרִיתֶם לָכָם עָרִים‎</span> [[Num.35.11|Num 35:11]] ye shall (***caus*** cities ***to occur*** rightly ***for yourselves***, i.e.) ***select*** cities ***as suitable***. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָה‎</span>] **verb denominative Pi\`el** ==lay the beams of, furnish with beams==; — with accusative of the building: ***Perfect*** 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵרוּהוּ‎</span> [[Neh.3.3|Neh 3:3]]; [[Neh.3.6|Neh 3:6]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְקָרוֺת‎</span> [[Neh.2.8|Neh 2:8]]; [[2Chr.34.11|2Chr 34:11]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּקָרֶה‎</span> [[Ps.104.3|Ps 104:3]] (figurative).
